This is a photo of a Philadelphia musician, not Beto O’Rourke

   candidate Beto O’Rourke with El Chapo and that this one shows him nearly
   nude with words like "atheist" and "slut" on his body.

An image of a man with a wet mark on the front of his pants was shared on

   college drunk and pissing his pants.
